attributes.action: replace the red and green men on pedestrian crossings with Ampelmännchen or similar.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In many parts of Berlin, and former east germany, the pedestrian traffic lights feature a happy man wearing a hat (Ampelmännchen). This looks far nicer than the current british man, and people are far more likely to obey a figure with which they can identify, than a meaningless shape. We therefore request that The Traffic Signs Regulations and General Directions (2002) is amended, allowing this as an alternative form; and that all new installations of pelican and similar crossings are required to use it.

An example of the german style can be seen on many internet websites

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
